He is a businessman and has been making a living selling dairy products for ten years.  Francisco wants to get ahead and so has worked hard and dedicated to time to expanding his business.  Francisco receives support from his wife and together they sell their products in the market.  Francisco is applying for a loan to buy milk in large quantities, salt, curdling agent, and more.  With this he will be able to satisfy his customers.  Francisco thinks this loan will help him to improve his quality of life.  he will be able to invest in his business and increase his income.  Francisco's future plans are to buy land and to improve his home.  His immediate goals are to buy cows and to start a chicken farm.  Francisco believes that all the loans have helped him greatly.  He feels satisfied as, because of what he has achieved, Francisco earns his own, fixed profits.

loans.use: to buy milk in large quantities, salt, curdling agent, and more.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a lady of thirty-five years, married to Richard and a mother of three lovely children. She operates a boutique in Kiambu and has been in this business for four years now. She gets a monthly income of sixteen thousand shillings.

This will be Elizabeth's first loan with KADET LTD. She plans to use the entire loan to buy new stock of clothes for her business.

In the future, she wants to be a successful businesswoman and provide for her children.

loans.use: to buy new stock of clothes to sell.

loans.name: Rogaciana

texts.en:
Rogaciana is 44 years old and from the community of Talibon, Bohol. She is married with three children.

 Rogaciana raises hogs and has been engaged in buying and selling of coconuts for nine years now. Her husband also helps by farming coconuts, too. She is asking for a loan to buy coconuts, and pay for labor and transportation during the delivery of crops.

She is hopeful that her work will pay off. In the future, she plans to expand her business, take good care of it and make it more profitable.

loans.use: to buy more coconuts, and pay for labor and transportation.

loans.name: Janviere

texts.en:
Janviere is 27 years old. She sells foodstuffs, such as rice, fish and onions. She has spent five years in the business. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more rice and fish for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more rice and fish for sale.

loans.name: Lina Andrea

texts.es: Lina es madre soltera de un bebé de 4 meses de nacido. A sus 25 años de edad, se dedica a atender su propio negocio que consiste en la venta de chorizos que inició hace aproximadamente 2 años, en la acera de su casa; inicialmente asaba el producto en un pequeño fogón de leña y, poco a poco su negocio fue tomando impulso y hoy en día ya funciona en un local ubicado en un sector muy transitado. La cliente se caracteriza por ser una joven emprendedora, activa, pujante y cada día trabaja con esmero y dedicación para sacar adelante a su hijo. Solicita el crédito con el ánimo de invertirlo en su negocio, pues con el dinero comprará insumos (chorizos y gaseosas) y realizará publicidad para atraer más clientela y así aumentar sus ventas, dando como resultado un incremento en las finanzas. De esta forma, Lina desea seguir avanzando y en un futuro tener la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria y ser profesional, además sueña con tener un gran asadero, que sea rentable y reconocido, con el que pueda generar mejores ingresos y dar a su hijo un mejor bienestar y calidad de vida.
texts.en: Lina is the single mother of a 4 month old baby. At 25 years old. she works at her own business she started about 2 years ago on the sidewalk in front of her house. At first she would grill the items on a small wood stove. Little by little her business got going and today she runs it in a locale located in a very busy area. She is described as being an enterprising young woman who is active, driven and who works every day with dedication and hard work to get her son ahead. She is asking for the loan to invest in her business. With the money, she will buy items (sausage and sodas) and make publicity to attract more customers and increase her sales so she can increase her earnings. This way, Lina wants to keep advancing and in the future have the opportunity to go to college and get a degree. She also dreams of having a great grill that is profitable and well known that she can generate better income with to give her son better well being and quality of life.

loans.use: to buy items (sausages and sodas)  and make some publicity to attract more customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to get the money together to buy a motorcycle taxi.

loans.name: Boubacar

texts.fr:
Né en Septembre 1989 à Kolondièba  chef-lieu de la dite  commune (3ème Région administrative du Mali),  Boubacar  marié  et sans enfant  y réside avec  sa femme dans une famille nucléaire.
 Il  s’est vite intéressé aux activités génératrices de revenus notamment à l’achat vente de  médicaments (produits forêver).  Il est très sollicité en ville et surtout dans les villages. 
Fort de ses années d’expériences dans le domaine, il collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  deuxième prêt, après avoir remboursé le prêt précédent. 
Boubacar compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter une importante quantité de médicaments. Il s’approvisionne chez les grossistes à Bamako. Il effectue ses ventes en détail au comptant de façon ambulante à une clientèle  composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Boubacar espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 90.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Born in September 1989 in the county seat of Kolondièba (the third administrative region of Mali), Boubacar is married. He has no children and lives with his wife in a nuclear family. From an early age on, he started earning a living, in particular buying and reselling medications (health products of the Forever brand). He has a lot of customers in his town and especially in the nearby villages. With many years of experience in this business, he collaborates with Soro Yiriwaso in order to bolster his capital and meet ever-growing customer demand. He is on his second loan, having duly repaid his first one.
Boubacar plans to use his loan to buy a large supply of medications. He stocks up from wholesalers in Bamako. He retails as a street vendor, for cash, to a mixed clientele. Boubacar hopes to earn an average monthly benefit of 90,000 West African francs, which will be used to provide for  family needs, repay his loan and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: to buy Forever health products for resale.

loans.name: Djordje

texts.en:
Djordje is 26 years old and single. He is a mathematics teacher in a primary school and has a very responsible personality. Currently, he lives in a minority community of Kosovo with only his old mother who has received a pension since his father died. The house that they live in is in need of repairs to the roof and also needs new facade in one of the rooms as a result of water damage from the broken roof leaking. 

Djordje is requesting a loan for the first time to buy the materials to make the necessary repairs to the roof and to complete the facade. This loan will help improve their living conditions and he hopes that by doing this, he and his mother will not have these kinds of problems any more. In the near future, he hopes to have a better life. Djordje is very happy for this opportunity and he thanks all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy materials to make necessary repairs to his roof and facade.

loans.name: Mirna Elizabeth

texts.es:
Doña Mirna tiene 31 años de edad es casada y madre de 2 hijos los cuales son menores de 4 años. Ella es ama de casa y agricultora desde toda una vida ya que en su familia la agricultura es una tradición y un medio de ingreso fortaleciendo la economía en su hogar. Con ellos vive una sobrina y sus suegros quienes hacen una gran compañía ya que colaboran con el cuidado de los niños cuando doña Mirna y su esposo se desplazan al campo para dar atención y cuidado a sus cultivos de café. Sus padres la apoyaron para que ella estudiara hasta donde pudieron logrando que ella cursara y terminara la primaria ya que sus ingresos no eran los mejores por lo que era muy difícil en ese tiempo el estudio. Ella agradece el apoyo brindado a sus padres ya que ellos hicieron un esfuerzo a pesar de su economía para que ella pudiera sentarse en las aulas de la escuela de la zona y pudiera recibir esa primera enseñanza que dirige, encamina e instruye a un buen futuro. Sus cultivos de café están a 5 minutos de distancia de su casa de habitación al cual se trasladan a pie involucrándose en tiempo de corte y recolección su familia incluyendo a 2 hermanos.  

Por lo que hoy en día su prioridad y su meta antes de que sus hijos asistan al kínder es de dar mantenimiento y fortalecimiento a sus cultivos de café logrando crear un patrimonio solido que con el tiempo sus hijos puedan beneficiarse. Ella ha solicitado a la cooperativa COMIXMUL un financiamiento con el cual comprara insumos agrícolas como abono, formula cafetalera, foliares, etc. que son de gran ayuda para el cuidado y fortalecimiento del grano.
texts.en:
Sra. Mirna is 31 years old and married with two children under 4 years old. She is a housewife and a farmer, a job she’s had all her life as she comes from a family of farmers. They have always earned their living from the land. A niece and her in-laws live with Mirna and her family. They are both good company and a great help to her as they look after her children when Mirna and her husband are out working in their coffee fields.

Mirna’s parents supported her while she completed primary school even though they did not have much money. It was a difficult time for them while she was still at school, and she is grateful that their support enabled her to study and have a good future. 

Mirna’s coffee fields are just five minutes away from the house on foot.   This is enough time for her to collect other family members including two siblings.

Even though her children are not yet old enough to attend kindergarten, Mirna’s priority is to tend her fields and ensure that they will be a good inheritance for her children. She is seeking a loan from the COMIXMUL cooperative to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizer specially formulated for coffee plants, spray etc. which will be a great help in keeping the plants healthy.

loans.use: buy agricultural supplies for her coffee fields

loans.name: Stojanka

texts.en:
Stojanka is 63 years old, divorced and the mother of 4 children who she lives with in a minority community in Kosovo. She has had to work hard for many years and has put a lot of effort into raising her family and supporting the children without having a husband. Stojanka has done this by working on her land doing agricultural work with a tractor along with the help of one of her sons. 

Now, Stojanka needs a loan to buy a new tractor. The loan will help her to continue her business (which brings a lot of profit) and will provide her with a way to save money for her family's future. Her goal is to have better living conditions for her family. Stojanka  wants to thank all Kiva lenders!

loans.use: to buy a new tractor.

loans.name: Matije

texts.en:
Matije is 61 years old and lives in the southern part of Kosovo. She and her husband both receive a small pension. Matije has had a very difficult life and is very sad. Her daughter suffers chronically from disease and her only son died during the war. Her son was married just prior to the war and had left behind his wife and a new daughter.  After his death, the wife left the home, leaving Matije to take care of the the child. Now she is very busy taking care of the girls and they have very difficult life conditions. 
Matije is requesting a loan in order to replace the doors and windows in her house because the house is very old. She believes that the loan will help them to have better living conditions and a better quality of life.  That is her goal, along with being able to offer a better education to her granddaughter. She wants to thanks all of the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to replace the doors and windows in her house.

loans.name: Wendy Karina

texts.es: Wendy de 25 años de edad, habita junto a su familia, en casa propia desde hace ya 2 años. Es una joven trabajadora que jamás se da por vencida y siempre cumple lo que se propone. Wendy vendiendo ropa y bolsas para pupusas en un mercado de la zona es así como se gana la vida honradamente y siempre da gracias a Dios porque los frutos obtenidos de su trabajo se ven en la mejora de su hogar poco a poco ha ido realizando los cambios necesarios, pero desea seguir haciéndolo lastima no tiene los recursos monetarios suficientes para cambiar el techo ya que se encuentra picado. es por esa razón que solicita  FUSAI un préstamo para la compra de materiales de construcción de dicho techo sustituyendo la teja por lamina galvanizada y clavos para techo entre otros. Espera realizar lo antes posible esta reparación así estarán más tranquila su familia dentro de su casa.
texts.en: Wendy is 25 years old and for the past two years has lived in her own house together with her family. She is a young worker who never gives up and always accomplishes her goals. She sells clothing and bags for pupusas (stuffed corn tortillas) in a local market. This is how she earns an honest living and she is always grateful to God because the fruit of her labor has enabled her to improve her home.  Little by little she has been making necessary changes and she wants to continue doing so.  Unfortunately, she doesn’t have sufficient monetary resources to replace the roof which is rusty and leaking.  This is why she is asking FUSAI for a loan to buy construction materials for the roof. She will replace the tile with sheets of galvanized metal and roofing nails. She hopes to do the repairs as soon as possible so that her family can be more comfortable in her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to replace the roof of her house which is rusty and leaking. This is why she is asking FUSAI for a loan. She will replace the tile with sheets of galvanized metal and roofing nails.

loans.name: Carolina Del Carmen

texts.es:
Carolina de 21 años de edad, debido a que su madre no la pudo mantener estudiando, solo logro sacar el sexto grado, es soltera y no tiene hijos. Después de dejar la escuela trabajo haciendo oficios domésticos en casa particular. Hoy en día ademas criá animales de granja, gallinas y cerdos

Carolina trabaja todavía como ama de casa en una residencia de la zona, a diario de levanta a las 5 de la mañana para alimentar a los animales que tiene en su casa, luego se va a su lugar de trabajo donde tiene que estar a las 7 de la mañana para eso tiene que camiar 500 metros.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar 5 cerdos y el concentrado para engordarlos, al tener una mayor producción espera mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia, porque quiere terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Carolina is 21 years old. She is single, and she has no children. Since her mother couldn't continue to support her studies, she only received an education through the sixth grade. After leaving school, she worked at various domestic jobs in private homes. Today, in addition, she raises farm animals such as chickens and pigs.

Today, Carolina works as a house keeper at a home in her area. She wakes up every day at 5:00 am to feed the animals that she has in her home, and then she walks the half kilometer to her workplace, where she has to be at 7:00 am.

This loan will be used to purchase five pigs and the concentrate to fatten them. Having greater production would mean improved living conditions for her family, because she wishes to finish her studies.

loans.use: purchase five pigs and the concentrate to fatten them.

loans.name: Kreshnik

texts.en: Kreshnik is 33 years old, married and the father of a two-year-old son. They all live in the southwest part of Kosovo. For the last 10 years, in order to earn a living, Kreshnik has owned his own business making furniture such as chairs and sofas as well as upholstering them with various sewing material. He has a lot of orders from both private companies and other individuals. For the first time he is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine and material for his work. His business is very rare, which allows him to have a lot of customers without competition. The loan will help him to increase his income. His goal is to expand his business even more in the future. He appreciates this help!

loans.use: To buy a new sewing machine and material for his work

loans.name: Bojlije

texts.en:
Bojlije is 42 years old, married and has four children between the ages of 12 and 20 years old. Her husband works as a driver in a private company and together they live in an area that is more economically developed than other cities in Kosovo. Bojlije  is known for her handicrafts, which she has been making and selling for the last 20 years to earn a living. 

She operates from home and sells locally to customers in the area and has developed a large customer base through the years. She is committed and puts a lot of effort into her work. She has requested this loan in order to buy materials and a new machine for her work, which will help her to be able to continue making her items. Her goal is to improve her family's living conditions and to save money towards her children’s education. She is very thankful for the help!

loans.use: To buy materials and a new machine for her work

loans.name: Gloria Del Carmen

texts.es:
Gloria de 46 años de edad, solo,pudo estudiar hasta primer grado ya que ayudaba a su madre en los oficios de la casa. Esta soltera y tiene 3 hijos todos independientes.

Gloria es ama de casa, se dedica a realizar oficios domésticos en casas particulares, y por las tarde vende tortillas. Conoce de actividades agrícolas y ayuda a su padre a trabajar la tierra fue con ellos que aprendió todo lo que sabe hoy en día.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar una novilla para engordarla y hacerla producir, con el tiempo espera triplicar la producción y quizá algún día poder construir su propia casa
texts.en:
Gloria is 46 years old. She is single and has three grown children. She only went to school through the first grade as she had to help her mother with the housework.

Gloria is a housekeeper who does domestic work in private homes, and in the afternoons she runs a business selling tortillas. She is familiar with agricultural work and helps her father work the land. It was from her parents that she learned everything she knows today.

The loan will be used to purchase a heifer for fattening and breeding. With time, she hopes to triple her production and maybe one day be able to build her own home.

loans.use: purchase a heifer for fattening and breeding

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy essential materials for her business and a new sewing machine

loans.name: Romeo

texts.en:
Romeo is 51 years old and married with three children. He lives in Talibon, Bohol with his family. Romeo catches fish for a living, while his wife farms seaweeds. He is asking for a loan to buy gasoline and pay for school. 

Romeo knows that all his hard work will never be in vain knowing that he is after the future of his children. 
In the future, he dreams of having another fishing boat so he can expand his business.

loans.use: to buy gasoline and pay for school.

loans.name: Lorena Elizabeth

texts.es:
Lorena de 25 años de edad, termino sus estudios de educación media, esta casada y tiene un hijo, nunca pudo trabajar formalmente y debido a la necesidad se vio obligada a trabajar criando pollos de engorde, oficio que le encanto y que todavía hace. 

Construyo una pequeña galera en un espacio del corredor de su casa, los lados los cubrió con sacos de plástico resistente donde viene el concentrado, pero bien segura para que otros animales no se metan a molestar los pollos; los comederos los fabrico con desperdicios de laminas y pedazos de madera pero bien adecuados para que no desperdicien el concentrado. Por las tardes vende pupusas.

Lorena, para comprar sus pollitos y sus insumos, aborda un autobús en su comunidad, y viaja durante 30 minutos hasta llegar a la ciudad, ahí compra en un agro servicio y luego regresa a casa.  

El préstamo que esta solicitando es, para comprar 100 pollitos de engorde y concentrado para terminar de criar un lote de pollos que ya tiene, además comprara 3 cerditos para engordarlos con los desperdicios de la venta de pupusas.  

Con el préstamo comprara todo el concentrado para sacar sus pollos en optimas condiciones, ya que a veces tiene que comprar por poquitos. Con el tiempo planea construir una galera, grande y adecuada para tener una buena granja.
texts.en:
Lorena is 25 years old, and completed a secondary education in school. She is married and has one son. She was never able to formally work, but necessity obliged her to begin working at raising chickens for meat. She loved this work and still does it.  In addition, in the afternoons, she sells pupusas, a traditional stuffed tortilla dish.

She built a small hen house in a space in a hallway in her home. She covered the sides with plastic sacking from the chicken feed to be sure that the other animals didn't get in and bother the chickens. She made the troughs out of leftover pieces of scrap metal and pieces of wood that were sufficient to ensure the feed didn't go to waste.

To purchase her chickens and supplies, Lorena rides a bus thirty minutes from her home town to the city where shops her farm supply store, and then returns home.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy 100 chickens for fattening and concentrated chicken feed so that she can finish raising the batch of chickens she already has. In addition, she will buy three piglets which she will fatten from the leftovers from her pupusa sales.

With this loan, she will buy all the chicken feed she needs to get her chickens to optimal conditions; she has sometimes had to make do with less. With time, she plans to build a bigger hen house, sufficient for a good farm.

loans.use: buy 100 chicks, concentrated chicken feed, and three piglets.

loans.name: Ivania Milagros

texts.es: Doña Ivania es originaria de la ciudad de Boaco, tiene 44 años de edad y madre soltera de 3 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante, se dedica a la venta de ropa usada, desde hace 10 años. Inicio esta actividad con dinero propio, poco a poco con esfuerzo logro establecer su negocio. Cuenta con el apoyo de su familia quienes la apoyan con la comercialización de  dichos productos de manera ambulante por diferentes comunidades. Tiene como otra fuente de ingresos el alquiler de un local. Solicita el crédito para comprar: blusas, camisas, pantalones, vestidos, suéter, chaquetas, sombreros, ropa interior entre otros, con el fin de satisfacer a sus clientes. Estima que el financiamiento será de beneficio, ya que podrá ofrecer a sus clientes variedad y calidad, obteniendo mayores ventas e ingresos. Su plan futuro es establecer el negocio en su casa y sus metas próximas son preparar profesionalmente a sus hijas y mantener su negocio estable.
texts.en:
Ivania is originally from the city of Boaco.  She is 44 years old and the mother of 3 children.  She has worked in sales for 10 years, specifically selling used clothing.  She started her business with her own money and has built it up little by little .  Her family supports her by helping her sell the above-mentioned goods on the streets of various areas near their home.

Besides her business, she makes additional income by renting out some property.

She is asking for a loan to buy blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, sweaters, jackets, hats, underwear, and other clothes.  In this way, she will be able to satisfy her customers.  She believes that the loan will help her by allowing her to offer her customers variety and good quality and thus obtain more sales and profits.

Her plan for the future is to stabilize and build up her business in her home and then help her daughters in their career pursuits.

loans.use: blouses, shirts, pants, dresses, sweaters, jackets, hats, underwear, etc.

loans.name: Shishoza Cb Group

texts.en:
Anonciata is 44 years old. She is a widow with two children aged between 18 and 20. They all go to school. 

Anonciata is group leader of Shishoza Group, which means Focused Group in English. Anonciata sells foodstuffs and has been running the business for the past ten years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and cooking oil to sell. All the group members sell different merchandise and they aim to upgrade their business. Anonciata plans to use the profits to build a house. The entire group intends to build strong businesses for their future.

loans.use: to buy more beans and cooking oil to sell

loans.name: Nelsy Joaquina

texts.es:
Nelsy tiene 28 años de edad la cual es casada, con muchos sueños, muchas ilusiones y con muchas ganas de superarse y salir adelante que en compañía de su esposo diariamente luchan para salir adelante. Ella tiene una hija la cual esta pequeña y está en la primaria cursando el segundo grado viviendo en casa solo ellos tres. Su ingreso y fortalecimiento económico para su hogar se basa en el rubro del café ya que en la zona donde ella habita la tierra y el clima son aptos para el desarrollo de esta actividad siendo no solo para su familia sino también para las otras familias un medio de ingreso. La tierra que ella y su esposo trabajan es propia gracias a una herencia por parte de por parte de sus padres la cual está ubicada a 45 minutos de camino desde su casa de habitación y en ocasiones sus hermanos se involucran para dar mantenimiento y poder hacer el corte para la venta.

Sus sueños son los de ser una productora de café con grandes oportunidades las cuales serían las poder exportar su producto a otros países, de esa manera ella generaría trabajo en su comunidad y podría fortalecer el patrimonio para sus hijos en un futuro extendiendo sus cultivos mediante la compra de tierra, apoyar a su hija en sus estudios y darle la oportunidad de ir a la universidad a prepararse. Por lo que ahora ella solicita un financiamiento para empezar a llevar a cabo sus sueños dando un mantenimiento a sus cultivos y protegiéndolos de bichos entre otros para así empezar a generar ganancias y empezar con sus sueños.
texts.en:
Nelsy is 28 years old and is married.  She has many dreams, hopes, and goals of progressing and getting ahead along with her husband as they struggle every day.  She has one young daughter (making 3 of them in the house) who is in the 2nd grade at primary school.  Her income and economic sustenance comes from coffee, since the land and climate where she lives are well suited for growing it.  Not only her family but many other families rely on it for income.  The land where she and her husband farm is owned by them and was inherited from her parents.  It takes 45 minutes to walk there from her house.  Occasionally, her brothers help out by tending the crop and also by harvesting.

Nelsy has big dreams which include become a major coffee producer, exporting her crop to other countries.  By so doing, she would create jobs within her community and also increase her children's inheritance by buying more land and growing more coffee.  In addition, she hopes to support her daughter's education and give her the opportunity to go to college to prepare for a professional career.

For these reasons, she is asking for a loan so she can start turning her dreams into reality.  She will use it to maintain her crop and protect it from pests, among other things.  In this way, she will start making what she needs to get started with her dreams.

loans.use: buy farming supplies to help her grow her coffee crop.

loans.name: Jeannette Del Socorro

texts.es: Doña Jeannette es originaria de la ciudad de Managua. Tiene 43 años de edad, madre soltera de 3 hijos. Es de oficio comerciante y se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace 20 años. Inicio vendiendo cajetas de forma ambulantes, poco a poco con esfuerzo y deseos de superación, logro mejorar su calidad de vida y entorno familiar. Solicita el crédito para comprar: arroz, frijoles, verduras, legumbres, carne, jugos, gaseosas entre otros con el fin de elaborar mayor producción a sus clientes. Estima que el crédito será de beneficio para adquirir mayores ingresos. Su plan futuro es mejorar la infraestructura de su casa y seguir apoyando a sus hijos en los estudios. Considera que los créditos son de mucha ayuda para los comerciantes que necesitan invertir en su negocio.
texts.en:
Jeannette is originally from the city of Managua.  She is 43 years old and is a mother of 3 children.  She has been working selling food for 20 years.  She started by selling caramels as a street vendor and little by little was able to improve her quality of life and the situation of her family.

She is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, vegetables, legumes, meat, juice, soda, and other things.  In this way, she will be able to earn more from her customers.  She believes that this loan will help her obtain higher income.  Her plan for the future is to improve the design of her house and continue to support her children in their studies.  She thinks that loans are very helpful to entrepreneurs who need to invest in their businesses.

loans.use: buy rice, beans, vegetables, legumes, meat, juice, soda, etc.

loans.name: Luís Ramon

texts.es:
Luis de 42 años de edad, esta acompañado y tiene dos hijos de 17 y 20 años de edad, realizo sus estudios hasta noveno grado debido a las dificultades económicas de su familia. Su esposa es ama de casa y también le colabora con las actividades agrícolas.

Es agricultor desde niño, su padre lo instruyo bien en el oficio, hoy en día trabaja la tierra con sus hijos y su esposa durante la mañana ordeña el ganado, vende la leche y cuida los animales en el potrero.

El préstamo será utilizado para comprar una vaca lechera, que le vende un familiar. Aumentaran la producción de leche y los ingresos de la familia.

Debido a la falta de espacio en la vivienda, Luis tiene planeado comprar un terreno donde pueda tener los animales, porque hasta el momento alquila un terreno cerca de la casa para poder guardarlos y esto le genera cierto gasto.
texts.en:
Luis is 42 years old, is married, and has 2 children (ages 17 and 20).  He only completed school up to the 9th grade, due to his family's financial problems.  His wife is a housewife and also helps him with the farming.

He has been a farmer since he was a child, having been taught the trade well by his parents.  Currently, he works alongside his children and his wife.  In the morning, he milks his cows, sells the milk, and then cares for his animals that are out to pasture.

This loan will be used to buy a milk cow that a family member wants to sell him.  His milk production and his family's income will increase.

Due to a lack of space on his property, Luis is planning to buy a plot of land where he can keep his animals.  For the moment, he rents some land near his house for this purpose.  In this way, he will be able to care for them better and also avoid an unneeded expense.

loans.use: buy a milk cow.

loans.name: Amilcar Mardoqueo

texts.es:
Amilcar de 52 años de edad, solo pudo estudiar hasta primer grado, porque tuvo que trabajar para ayudar a su familia,es casado, tiene 7 hijos, 4 de ellos menores de edad y estudian, los demás trabajan con Amilcar en actividades agrícolas. Su esposa ademas de ocuparse de la casa, todos los días por la tarde vende pupusas.

Desde pequeño es agricultor, aprendió todo de su padre, en estos momentos tiene sembrado 14,000 metros cuadrados de maíz. Diariamente se levanta a las 5 de la mañana para ordeñar el ganado, prepara la leche para vender y luego se va a trabajar al cultivo que esta a un kilómetro de donde vive. Al finalizar su día de trabajo ayuda a su esposa con la venta de pupusas.

Amilcar necesita comprar fertilizantes para el cultivo de maíz y también necesita preparar 7,000 metros cuadrados para siembra de otra parcela.

El objetivo personal de Amilcar es renovar su lote de ganado, y sacar a sus hijo con un titulo universitario.
texts.en:
Amilcar is 52 years old.  He was only able to study until the end of 1st grade because he had to work to help his family.  He is married and has 7 children.  Four of them are young and in school while the others work with Amilcar in farming.  His wife, in addition to running the house, sells pupusas every day.  He has been a farmer since he was young and learned from his father.  Currently, he has 14,000 square meters of corn planted.  He wakes up every day at 5:00 am to milk the cows, get the milk ready to sell, and go work on his crops that are located one kilometer from where he lives.  At the end of the day, he helps his wife sell pupusas.

Amilcar needs to buy fertilizer for his corn crop.  In addition, he needs to prepare 7,000 square meters for the planting of another crop.  Amilcar's goal is to restore his cattle herd and support his children through college.

loans.use: buy fertilizer and prepare a plot for planting.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to add to her stock of cereals and fruits

loans.name: Ranj's Group

texts.en:
Dyari is a member of this group from Iraq. Dyari is 33 years old, married and has two children. Dyari is a veterinarian; he has five years of experience in this job.

Dyari has a smart 8-year-old boy named Zhyar, who always gets high grades in school. He is studying in a private school. The annual tuition for the school is very expensive. Every year the family faces the problem of making ends meet at the beginning of the school year for the additional expense that is needed to cover the fees, school uniform and books. With this loan, now they can accommodate all these expenses and continue to give him the best education possible.

He is requesting a loan to pay for his son's tuition fees and other school expenses. Zhyar loves traveling and airplanes, and his dream is to become a pilot.

The story of Zhyar is just one of the many examples of Izdiharona Economic Development clients who are able to get a better education. They preferred to have their faces altered for cultural reasons.

loans.use: to pay for his son’s education.

loans.name: Frida

texts.en:
Fridah operates a general store business, selling at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other food stall operators in her business. 

With 30,000 Kenyan shillings, she wants to purchase sugar, rice, wheat flour and maize flour for sale. She dreams of expanding to her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, wheat flour and maize flour to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to open another food business.

loans.name: Shahlo

texts.ru: Шахло всего 29 лет. Она с ранних лет помогала родителям с работой на скотном дворе, и знает это ремесло очень хорошо. Купле-продажей крупнорогатого скота Шахло начала заниматься три года тому назад и по сей день продолжает выращивать скот для дальнейшей продажи. Она из района Зафаробод. Большая часть людей в районе занимаются животноводством, выращиванием скота и производством молока. В данный момент Шахло имеет только одну дойную корову и бычка. И хочет на деньги от кредита купить пару бычков и увеличить поголовье скота. Шахло уверена, что у нее все получится, потому что ей всегда помогут ее сын и муж. Желаем ей успеха в делах.
texts.en: Shahlo is only 29 years old. Since the yearly years she has been helping her parents work with livestock and knows this craft very well. She started buying and reselling cattle three years ago and continues to grow cattle for future resale. She is from the Zafarobod region. A large part of the residents in the region do animal husbandry and grow cattle and produce milk. At this time Shahlo only has one milk cow and a calf. She wants to use the loan money to buy a couple of calves and increase the headcount of livestock. Shahlo is positive that everything will come out alright because her son and husband always help her. We wish her success in her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves and increase the headcount of livestock.

loans.name: Salohiddin

texts.ru:
Многие граждане Таджикистана на заработках заграницей, потому что в городах очень мало рабочих мест, а в районах и деревнях основным видом деятельности является животноводство или растениеводство. И молодим людям, чтобы прокормить семью приходиться покидать родные города, селы и районы для финансового обеспечения родных людей. И всем им нелегко вдали от Родины и родных душ. Салохиддин настолько любить свою семью, что не смог далеко уехать, хоть и на Родине работа тяжелая и мало платят, это не страшно, ведь он будет рядом семьей. 
Салохиддину 30 лет он работает фермеров. Работа на земле тяжелая, но он не жалуется. Салохиддину помогает жена. Он мог бы все сам сделать, но ее присутствие дает ему силу. У Салохиддина большая семья с ним живут жена, шестеро детей, родители и трое братьев. К приходу зимы он хорошо готовиться и кредит берет с целью приобрести минеральные удобрения и горючей смеси для техники. Салохиддин счастлив, что у него такая дружная семья, и она именно она поможет осеннему посеву.
texts.en:
Many of Tajikistan's inhabitants are migrant workers, because there are very few jobs in the cities, and in the regions and villages the main type of business is livestock breeding and crop cultivation. Young people have to leave their native cities, villages and regions to, in order to feed their family and support the native people financially. And to them all, it is not easy to be far away from their native land and soul. 

Salohiddin loves his family so much that he was not able to travel far, even though work is hard and they pay is small in his native country. It is not strange, as he can be near his family. Salohiddin is 30 years old and works as a farmer. The work in the field is hard, but he does not complain. Salohiddin's wife helps him. He could do it by himself, but her presence gives him strength. 

Salohiddin has a large family. He lives with his wife, six children, parents and three brothers. He prepares well for the arrival of winter and takes a loan with an aim to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel mix for his appliances. Salohiddin is happy that he has such a friendly family, and that they always help with the fall sowing.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers and fuel mixture to prepare for the fall sowing

loans.name: Las Puntuales Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro socias una de ellas es Consuelo mujer de 51 años de edad, vive en unión libre, su negocio es la venta de oro y plata desde hace 20 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de más inventario de prendas de oro y plata como anillos, cadenas, aretes y pulseras. Rubi mujer de 30 años su negocio es  la venta de ropa nueva, usada y cosméticos, Rosa mujer de 43 años de edad su negocio es el destace de cerdo, venta de gaseosas y golosinas y Nilda mujer 49 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa, calzado, hielo, y refrescos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of 4 members, one of whom is Consuelo, a 51-year-old woman who lives in a common-law marriage. Selling gold and silver has been her business for 20 years. She is asking for a loan to buy more inventory of gold and silver jewelry such as rings, chains, earrings, and bracelets. 

The other women in this group are: Rubi, a 30-year-old woman who sells new and used clothing and cosmetics, Rosa, a 43-year-old woman whose business is a butcher shop that also sells soda water and candies, and Nilda, a 49-year-old woman who sells clothing, shoes, ice, and soft drinks.

loans.use: to buy more inventory of gold and silver jewelry such as rings, chains, earrings, and bracelets.

loans.name: Primero Dios Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos es Damaso un hombre muy trabajador de 57 años. Se dedica a la agricultura desde hace  11 años, casado, con un hijo bajo su cargo. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de insumos para la siembra de maíz y comercializacion de frijoles crudos. Rolando tiene 50 años él se dedica al negocio de  elaboración de zapatos y María tiene  53 años y su negocio es la venta de sandalias.
texts.en: This group has three members who are small business owners. One of these is Damaso, a 57-year-old hard-working man. He has worked in agriculture for 11 years. He is also married and looks after his son. He has been a client of this institution for five years and is requesting a loan in order to purchase supplies for planting corn and selling his beans to market. Rolando is 50 years old and makes shoes for a living. Maria is 53 years old and sells sandals for a living.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for planting corn and selling beans

loans.name: Ricardo Rivera Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres comerciantes emprendedoras una de ellas es Milagros mujer de 37 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos por catálogos de Arabela, Avon y Celza desde hace 3 años, es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cosméticos al contado como es cremas, lociones, lápiz delineador, tratamientos faciales, etc. Celsa mujer de 38 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de ropa interior y María Isabel mujer de 37 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos variados.
texts.en: The group consists of three entrepreneurial retailers. One of them is Milagros, a 37-year-old woman, who has two children under her care. Her 3-year-old business includes the sale of cosmetics through the following catalogs: Arebela, Avon, and Celza. She has been a client of the institution for a year. She has requested this loan to buy cosmetics with cash, such as creams, lotions, eye liner pencils, face treatments, etc. Celsa, a 38-year-old woman, works selling underwear, and María Isabel is a 37-year-old woman whose business involves the sale of various kinds of cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics such as creams, lotions, eye liner pencils, face treatments, etc.

loans.name: Laura Vicuña Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman cuatro microempresarias  de éxito una de ellas es Apolonea una mujer de 45 años de edad, viuda, su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras desde hace 20 años. Sus productos los comercializa en el mercado, tiene 7 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de más inventario de frutas y verduras como naranja, papa, ajo, tomate, etc. Jenny  mujer de 34 años ella se dedica al negocio de la venta de frutas y verduras, Jazmina mujer de 26 años su negocio es una mueblería y Josefa ella tiene 58 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: The group is made up of four successful micro-entrepeneurs.  One of them, Apolonea, is a 45-year-old widow.  Her business for the last 20 years has been the sale of fruit and vegetables.  She sells her produce in the market and she has been a client in the institution for 7 years.  She is asking for the loan to buy more stock of fruit and vegetables, such as oranges, potatoes, garlic, tomatoes, etc.  The other members of the group are Jenny, 34, who works selling fruit and vegetables; Jazmina, 26, whose business is a furniture store; and Josefa, 58, whose business is the sale of fruit and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fruit and vegetables such as oranges, potatoes, garlic, and tomato.

loans.name: Las Frescas Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres mujeres esforzadas una de ellas es Esmeralda una mujer luchadora de 33 años de edad, casada, con cuatro hijos menores bajo su cargo de 15, 13, 7 y 3 años. Su negocio es la venta de comida en su comunidad desde hace 12 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 2  años.  El crédito lo está solicitando para invertir en comprar materia prima por cantidad como es granos básicos arroz, frijoles, aceite, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne de pollo, vegetales, verduras, etc. Concepción mujer de 35 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de nacatamales  y  Dominga mujer de 54 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de nacatamales y comida.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking women.  Esmeralda is a hardworking 33 year old woman. She is married and has three young children, ages 15, 13, 7, and 3.  She has been selling food in her community for 12 years and has been working with the institution for two years.  She is asking for this loan to buy ingredients such as rice, beans, cooking oil, beef, pork, chicken, vegetables, etc.  Concepcion is 35 years old and sells nacatamales, and Dominga is 54 years old and sells nacatamales and other food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Adonai Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman cuatro miembros emprendedores y luchadores uno de ellos es Dorcas mujer de  44 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería que tiene en su domicilio desde hace 2 años. El crédito lo requiere para surtir más su negocio. Comprar arroz, azúcar, aceite, jabón, frijoles, gaseosa coca cola,  big cola y detergente. María mujer de 45 años de edad su negocio es la venta de productos lácteos, Kedwin hombre de 28 años se dedica a la fabricación de muebles y Juana mujer de 63 años y su negocio es la elaboración de muebles.
texts.en: This group is comprised of four hard-working entrepreneurs. One of them, Dorcas, is a 44-year old woman who is married and has two dependent children. She has had a grocery shop at her home for two years. She needs the loan to buy more merchandise to sell: rice, sugar, cooking oil, soap, broad beans, soft drinks and detergent. The other members of the group are María (45), who sells dairy, Kedwin (28), and Juana (63), both carpenters.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell.

loans.name: Ilucion Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo integran seis mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es María mujer de 49 años de edad, soltera, con una hija de 18 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 7 años, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de pacas de ropa mixta y ropa nueva como calcetas, brasieres, blúmeres, zapatos usados. María de los Ángeles mujer de 40 años de edad se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa nueva, usada, y calzado nuevo, Fátima mujer de 38 años de edad, su negocio es estilista y venta de ropa nueva, Karla mujer de 28 años su negocio es la venta de nacatamales, queso y café, Jessica mujer de 37  años se dedica al negocio de  vender ropa usada, cosméticos y calzado y Concepción mujer de 49 años y su negocio es elaborar bolsos y ropa de cama.
texts.en: This group is comprised of six women entrepreneurs. María is one of them: she is 49 years old, single, and has an 18-year old daughter. She has been selling clothing, both used and new, for the past five years. She has been a client of the field partner for seven. The loan will be used to buy mixed bags of clothes such as socks, brassieres, and bloomers, as well as used shoes. The other members of the group are: María de los Ángeles (40), who sells new and used clothing, and new shoes, Fátima (38), a stylist who also sells new clothes, Karla (28), who sells nacatamales, cheese, and coffee, Jessica (37), who sells used clothing, cosmetics, and shoes, and Concepción (49), who makes bags and linens.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell, both used and new.

loans.name: Buen Pastor Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres mujeres luchadoras y  emprendedoras una de ellas es  Isabel mujer de 50 años de edad casada, con una hija de 31 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa usada, venta de comida, frutas y frescos desde hace 20 años su hija y ella son las que se encargan del negocio, tiene 9 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo requiere para compra de paca de ropa usada y materia prima para la elaboración de la comida como es arroz, leña, frijoles, aceite, carbón, queso, carne de res, carne de cerdo, carne  de pollo, plátanos, bolsas, papel de comida. Melida mujer de 45 años de su negocio es una pulpería en su domicilio y Damaris mujer de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de recarga, chiverías, gaseosa, hielo y agua.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising women.  Isabel is one of them; she is 50 years old, married, and has a 31 year old daughter.  She has been selling used clothing, food, fruits, and drinks for 20 years.  He daughter and she run the business and she has been working with the institution for nine years.  She needs this loan to buy a pack of used clothing, and supplies to make her food, such as rice, firewood, beans, cooking oil, charcoal, cheese, beef, pork, plantains, bags, and butcher paper.  Melinda, 45 years old runs a store out of her home; and Damaris, 34 years old, sells recarga, chiverías, soft drinks, ice, and water

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Las Elegidas Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socios luchadores y emprendedores una de ellos es  Mercedes mujer de 60 años de edad, viuda, con una hija mayor bajo su cargo. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada desde hace 15 años. Este negocio lo tiene ubicado en su domicilio, su hija y ella atiende a los clientes, tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de ropa usada y compra de zapatos nuevos. Anespajita  mujer de 65 años de edad se dedica al negocio de venta de refresco, golosina, gaseosa, raspadita, lotería y Larry hombre de 34 años de edad,  su negocio es la venta de CD.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking, enterprising partners.  Mercedes is one of them and she is 60 years old and a widow with a daughter.  She has been selling used clothing for 15 years and her business is located in her home.  She and her daughter serve customers and she has been working with the institution for six years.  She will use the money from this loan to buy used clothing and new shoes.  Anespajita, age 65 sells soft drinks, snacks, snow cones, and lottery tickets; and Larry, age 35, sells CDs.

loans.use: to buy used clothing.

loans.name: La Domesticas Group

texts.es: El Grupo lo conforman tres mujeres esforzadas microempresarias una de ellas es Julia mujer de 45 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 25 y 18 años. Su negocio es fabricar cepillos de lavar ropa desde hace 17 años de edad,  sus hijos le ayudan en la elaboración del producto, es cliente de la institución desde hace  3 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar materia prima como es nylon, madera, alambre, mazo, tijeras, etc. Dolores mujer de 42 años de edad se dedica a la venta de cosméticos por catálogo de Avon y Margarita mujer de 30 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking small businesswomen.  Julia is one of them.  She is 45 years old, single, and has two children, ages 25 and 18.  She has been making clothing scrub brushes since she was 17 years old.  Her children help her make her products and she has been working with the institution for three years.  She needs this loan to buy supplies such as nylon, wood, wire, mallets, scissors, etc.  Dolores, age 42, sells Avon cosmetics via catalog; and Margarita, age 30, sells new clothing.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Asociacion Sin Fronteras Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Lidia una mujer luchadora de 42 años de edad, casada, su negocio es la venta de artesanía de madera y una mini pulpería desde hace 4 años, su marido le ayuda a despachar la mini pulpería mientras ella atiende el negocio de la artesanía que tiene ubicado en Catarina. Tiene 6 años de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de artesanía de madera y granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, frijoles, etc. para su pulpería, Socorro mujer de 55 años su negocio es la venta de papeles para la fritangas y Felipa mujer de 54 años su negocio es la venta de verduras.
texts.en: This group is made up of three small businesswomen.  Lidia is one of them and she is a hardworking, 42 year old woman.  She is married and sells wooden arts and crafts.  She has also had a small store for four years.  Her husband helps her run her store, while she tends to the art business that she has in Catarina.  She has been working with the institution for six years and is asking for this loan to buy wooden arts and crafts and rice, sugar, cooking oil, beans, etc. for her store.  Socorro, age 55, sells food wrappers for fry restaurants; and Felipa, age 54, sells vegetables.

loans.use: to buy wooden arts.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es: Isabel es una mujer microempresaria de éxito de 48 años de edad casada, con un hijo de 16 años bajo su cargo, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 8 años, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar en inventario como aceite, frijoles, jabones, pasta dental, azúcar, arroz, gaseosa, helados, hielo, queso, leche, shampoo, desodorante, etc.
texts.en:
Isabel is a successful woman who owns a small business. She is forty-eight years old, married and has a sixteen-year-old child under her care. Her business is a small grocery store that has been located in her home for eight years. 

She is requesting the loan to invest in the purchase of inventory like oil, brands, soaps, toothpaste, sugar, rice, soft drinks, ice cream, ice, cheese, milk, shampoo, deodorant, etc.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of staple goods like corn, beans, sugar, oil, detergent, bath soap, dish soap, toothpaste, a variety of soft drinks, ice cream, ice, cheese, milk, shampoo, deodorant, etc.

loans.name: Jacqueline Vanessa

texts.es: Jacqueline es una mujer muy emprendedora de 31 años de edad, madre soltera, con un hijo de 12 años, su negocio es la de  una pulpería desde hace 3 años ubicada en su domicilio. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años el crédito le ha ayudado mucho ya que empezó vendiendo cosmético y ahora quiere invertir en comprar inventario para su pulpería como arroz, aceite, azúcar, frijoles, jabón, café, shampoo, gaseosa, detergente, pasta de diente, papel higiénico, caramelos, galletas, meneítos, etc.
texts.en: Jacqueline is a very enterprising 31-year-old woman. A single mother with a son of 12 years old, she has run a grocery store from her home for the past 3 years. She has been a client of this institution for six years, and the loan has helped her a lot since she began selling cosmetics. Now she wants to invest in buying stock for her store such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, soap, coffee, shampoo, soft drinks, detergent, toothpaste, toilet roll, sweets, biscuits, snacks, etc.

loans.use: to buy stock for her store such as rice, oil, sugar, beans, soap, coffee, shampoo, soft drinks, detergent, toothpaste, toilet roll, sweets, biscuits, snacks, etc.

loans.name: Nueva Vida Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ellas es Lilliam mujer de 33 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 16 y 13 años, su negocio es la venta de verduras desde hace 5 años, tiene de ser cliente de la institución desde hace 15 años. El crédito lo solicita para  comprar sacos de verduras como papas, cebolla, chiltoma y ajo. Teresa mujer de 64 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de cosa de horno y Silvia mujer de 44 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de tamal pisque, pinol y pinolillo.
texts.en: This group is made up of three successful, enterprising women.  Lilliam, age 33, is married and has two children, ages 16 and 13.  She has been selling vegetables for five years and has been working with the institution for 15 years.  She is asking for this loan to buy sacks of vegetables such as potatoes, onions, chiltoma, and garlic.  Teresa, age 64, sells baked goods; and Silvia, age 44, sells tamales, roasted corn, and pinolillo.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Aleyda Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras y luchadoras una de ellas es Griselda mujer de 24 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es un taller de costura desde hace 2 años, su mama y su hermana trabajan junto con ella cociendo. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de telas, hilos, botones, cintas, crochet, Sugey mujer de 32 años de edad su negocio es la elaboración y venta de piñatas y Clara mujer de 30 años de edad y su negocio es la compra y venta de frutas.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking and enterprising partners.  Griselda is one of them.  She is 24 years old, single, and has had a sewing shop for two years.  Her mother and sister work with her.  She has been working with the institution for one year and will use the money from this loan to buy fabrics, threads, buttons, laces, and crochets.  Sugey, age 32, makes and sells piñatas; and Clara, age 30, buys and sells fruits.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Dulce Sinfonia Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Zayda una mujer de 29 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 4 y 2 años, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 4 años. Su mama le ayuda a despachar,  Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año tiempo que ha demostrado ser muy responsable. El crédito lo solicita para comprar granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, jabones de lavar ropa y comprar un congelador. Melania mujer de 41 año su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras y Fátima joven de 21 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: This group is made up of three enterprising partners.  Zayda is one of them.  She is 29 years old, single, and has two children, ages 4 and 2.  She has had a store in her home for the past four years and her mother helps her serve customers.  She is asking for a loan to buy rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, laundry soap, and also a freezer.  Melania, age 41, sells fruits and vegetables, and Fatima, age 21, also sells fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Flor Del Oto Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socios microempresarios uno de ellos Michael hombre trabajador de 28 años de edad, acompañado, con dos hijos de 6 y 2 años. Su negocio es vender productos variados desde hace 7 años, sus productos los comercializa ambulante en el mercado de Masaya. Tiene 2 años y medio de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para comprar más inventario de talladores, toallas, chinelas de hule, etc. Karla mujer de 22 años de edad su negocio es comercializar productos varios como toallas, talladores, chinelas y Flor mujer 21 años su negocio es la venta de productos variados como chinelas, prensadores, talladores, toallas.
texts.en: This group is made up of three small business owners.  Michael is one and is a hardworking, 28 year old man.  He is married and has two children, ages 6 and 2.  He has been selling various products for seven years on foot in the Masaya market.  He has been working with the institution for two and a half years and is asking for this loan to buy inventory such as rubber scrubbers, towels, rubber slippers, etc.  Karla, age 22, sells various products such as towels, scrubbers, and slippers; and Flor, age 21, sells various products such as slippers, hair pins, scrubbers, and towels.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Jehova Nice Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias luchadoras una de ellas es Esperanza mujer de 50 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es una pulpería que tiene ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 15 años, es cliente de la institución desde hace 6 años el crédito lo requiere para la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles crudos, aceite, azúcar, jabón, ace, cloro, gaseosas, productos lácteos. Rosa mujer de 72 años de edad su negocio es la venta de prendas de plata y Nora mujer de 45 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de pollo.
texts.en: This group is made up of three hardworking partners.  Esperanza is one of them.  She is 50 years old, single, and has had a store in her home for 15 years.  She has been working with the institution for six years and needs this loan to buy rice, raw beans, cooking oil, sugar, soap, ace, bleach, soft drinks, and dairy products.  Rosa, age 72, sells silver accessories; and Nora, age 45, sells chicken.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Mujeres Luchadoras Group

texts.es: Grupo conformado por tres socias de negocio una de ellas es Elsa mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 10 y 5 años, su negocio es la venta de ropa  nueva desde hace 5 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución  2 años, el crédito lo requiere para comprar inventario de ropa nueva como pantalones, faldas, camisas, blusas, shores, y compra de materia prima para la elaboración de buñuelos, cabeza de chancho, frito y venta de frescos. Martha mujer de 29 años se dedica a la venta de platanitos, cosméticos de Avon y Arabela y María mujer de 34 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon, Arabela, helados, gaseosas, comida y piñata
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members. One of them is Elsa, a 28 year old woman with a partner and two children of 10 and 5 years of age. She has worked selling new clothes for five years and has been a client of this institution for two. She needs a loan to buy merchandise such as pants, skirts, jumpers, shirts, and shorts, and to buy ingredients to make buñuelos, pigs head and fries as well as soft drinks to sell. 

Martha, a 29 year old woman, sells plantains and cosmetics from Avon and Arabela, while María, a 34 year old woman, also sells Avon and Arabela cosmetics as well as ice cream, soft drinks, food and piñatas.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as pants, skirts, jumpers, shirts, and shorts, and to buy ingredients to make buñuelos, pigs head,and fries as well as soft drinks to sell

loans.name: Lluvia De Amor Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Ninoska mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 9 años y 2 meses. Su negocio es comercializar productos variados desde hace 7 años,  ella y su marido  van a vender ambulantes. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 4 años, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en comprar sillas de madera, cerámica, caramelos de leche de burra, trocante, churros, caramelos rayados. Xiomara mujer de 45 años de edad  su negocio es la venta de plantas, especies y artesanía, Waleska mujer de 25 años se dedica a comercializar artesanía, plantas y muebles y Luisa mujer de 56 años su negocio es  la venta de artesanía y verduras.
texts.en:
This group is made up of four enterprising women, one of whom is Ninoska, a 28 year old woman who has a partner and two children who are 9 years old and two months respectively. She has worked selling various products for seven years and both her and her husband work as street vendors. She has been a client of this institution for four years. The loan she is applying for at the moment will be used to buy wooden chairs, ceramics, caramels, trocantes, churros and other sweets.

 Xiomara is a 45 year old woman who runs a business selling plants, herbs and hand crafts. Waleska is a 25 year old woman who sells hand crafts, plants and furniture, while Luisa is a 56 year old woman who works selling handcrafts and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy wooden chairs, ceramics, caramels, trocantes, churros and other sweets

loans.name: Los Zensontles Group

texts.es: Este grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Paula mujer de 42 años de edad, acompañada, con dos hijos de 22 y 17 años, su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de Avon, Selza y Estilo desde hace 8 años, sus productos los comercializa en su comunidad. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 7 años. El crédito lo requiere para comprar al contado cosméticos de Avon, Selza y Estilo como perfumes de varón y damas, boddy, lencería, sombras, máscaras para pestañas, lápiz de cejas, labiales, pinturas de uñas, etc. María mujer de 60 años de edad su negocio es la elaboración y venta de cosa de horno y María del Rosario mujer de 46 años su negocio es la venta de cosméticos
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members of micro businesses, one of whom is Paula, a 42 year old woman with a partner and two children of 22 and 17 years of age. She has sold Avon, Selza y Estilo cosmetics in her community for eight years and has been a client of this institution for seven. She needs this loan to buy Avon, Selza and Estilo cosmetics, perfumes for men and women, lingerie, eye shadow, mascara, eyebrow pencils, lipstick, nail polish etc. 

María is a 60 year old woman who runs a business making and selling oven baked goods, while María del Rosario is a 46 year old woman who sells cosmetics for a living.

loans.use: to buy Avon, Selza and Estilo cosmetics in cash, perfumes for men and women, lingerie, eye shadow, mascara, eyebrow pencils, lipstick, nail polish etc.

loans.name: Los Finqueros Group

texts.es: Este grupo está conformado tres socios luchadores uno de ellos es Johana mujer de 29 años de edad, acompañada con cuatro hijos de 15, 9 ,8 y 2 años. Su negocio es la venta de ropa usada y cosméticos por catálogo de Avon  desde hace 3 años. Su hermana le ayuda a distribuir en la zona franca. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 2 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar ropa interior como blumers, brasieres, bóxer y uniformes escolares. Ingrid mujer de 21 años de edad su negocio es la venta de cosméticos generales y Osmar hombre de 34 años de edad y su negocio es la agricultura.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three hard-working members. One is Johana, a 29-year-old woman who has four children aged 15, 9, 8, and 2.  She sells used clothing and has sold Avon cosmetics by catalog for the past three years. Her sister helps her with distribution in the free-trade zone. She has been a client of the institution for two years. The loan is being requested so she can buy underwear such as underpants, bras and boxers, and school uniforms.

Ingrid is a 21-year-old woman who sells cosmetics and Osmar is a 34-year-old man whose business is agriculture.

loans.use: to buy underwear such as underpants, bras, and boxers, and school uniforms.

loans.name: Los Tres Girasoles Group

texts.es: El grupo Está formado por tres socias microempresarias de éxito una de ellas es Jeaneth mujer de 36 años de edad, soltera, con dos hijos de 6 años y 7 meses, su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva, zapatos usados y repostería desde hace 10 años, estos productos los comercializa en Granada y Nindiri. Tiene 2 años y medio de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para comprar mercadería de ropa nueva como pantalones de varón y dama, blusas, camisas, shores, faldas, etc.  Y zapatos usados. Jessica mujer de 27 años de edad se dedica al negocio de vender ropa nueva y productos de Avon, María  joven de 23 años y su negocio es la venta de cerámica y muebles.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three members of successful micro businesses, one of whom is Jeaneth, a 36 year old single woman with two children who are 6 years old and seven months. She has had a business selling new clothes, second hand shoes and confectionery for the last ten years and she sells these products in Granada and Nindiri. She has been a client of this institution for two and a half years and she needs this loan now to buy new clothes such as pants for men and women, shirts, tops, shorts, skirts, and second hand shoes. 

Jessica is a 27 year old woman who sells new clothes and Avon products, while María, a young woman of 23, sells ceramics and furniture.

loans.use: to buy new clothes such as pants for men and women, shirts, tops, shorts, skirts, and second hand shoes

loans.name: Carolina Asuncion

texts.es: Carolina es una joven de 20 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio desde hace 9 años. Su mama le ayuda a despachar, El crédito lo solicita para compra de productos de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, crudos, aceite, azúcar, jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de lavar trastes, jabón de baño, gaseosas de diferentes tamaños, etc.
texts.en:
Carolina is a young single woman of 20 who has worked in a grocery store run from her home for the last nine years, with her mother helping her to serve customers. 

This loan will be used to purchase pulses such as rice and uncooked beans, oil, sugar, soap for washing clothes, dish washing and bathing, soft drinks of different sizes, etc.

loans.use: to buy pulses such as rice and uncooked beans, oil, sugar, soap for washing clothes, dish washing and bathing, soft drinks of different sizes, etc.

loans.name: Marbelly Del Rosario

texts.es: Marbelly es una mujer luchadora de 33 años de edad, acompañada, con un hijo de 5 años, su negocio es una tapicería desde hace 10 años, su compañero hace el proceso del tapizado. El crédito lo solicita para comprar materiales para elaborar el tapizado de muebles como madera, tela, cuerina, hilo.
texts.en:
Marbelly,33, is a fighter. She is in a relationship and has a 5-year-old son. Marbelly has had an upholstery’s shop for ten years. Her partner is in charge of the upholstery process.

She is requesting a loan to buy materials for her business, such as wood, fabric, imitation leather and threads.

loans.use: to buy materials like wood, imitation leather, fabric and threads for her upholstery business.

loans.name: Los Jirones Group

texts.es: El grupo está conformado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Casimira mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos de 11, 9, 3 y 1 año, su negocio es la venta de recarga, venta de madera y agricultura desde hace 10 años, su marido le ayuda a comprar y vender la madera. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de frijoles por quintal en el norte para comercializarlos en Masaya. María mujer de 28 años de edad su negocio es una pulpería y Maribel mujer de 37 años su negocio es la venta de arroz de leche y buñuelos.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Casimira, who is 28 years old, married, and has four children, ages 11, 9, 3 and 1. Her business for ten years now is selling pre-paid cell phone minutes and wood, and working in agriculture. Casimira says that her husband helps her to buy and sell the wood. 

Casimira is requesting this loan to buy beans in bulk in the north of the country, which she plans to sell in Masaya [a city south of Managua]. 

Maria is 28 years old and her business is a small grocery store. Maribel is 37 years old and her business is selling rice pudding and fritters.

loans.use: To buy beans in bulk to sell.

loans.name: Ousmane

texts.fr:
Né en Décembre 1986 à Kolondièba  chef-lieu de la dite  commune, Ousmane   marié et père d’un enfant y réside avec  sa femme dans une famille nucléaire.
 Mr Ousmane s’est intéressé aux activités de boulanger il y a 7 ans.  Il est très sollicité en ville,  dans les villages et surtout les jours de foire. 
Fort de ses années d’expériences dans le domaine, il collabore avec Soro Yiriwaso pour augmenter  son fonds de commerce afin de satisfaire sa clientèle qui ne cesse de grandir et est à son  deuxième prêt, après avoir remboursé le prêt précédent. 
Ousmane compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter des sacs de  farine de blé. Il s’approvisionne chez les grossistes à Bamako et souvent à Kolondièba. Il effectue ses ventes de pain en détail au comptant  dans sa boulangerie et de façon ambulante à une clientèle  composée d’hommes et de femmes.
Ousmane espère réaliser un bénéfice mensuel de 85.000FCFA qui sera utilisé pour  subvenir aux besoins de la famille, rembourser le prêt et réinvestir dans son activité.
texts.en:
Born in December 1986 in Kolondièba, capital of the district by the same name, Ousmane is married, the father of one child and resides with his wife in a nuclear family.

Mr Ousmane became interested in baking activities seven years ago. He is very much in demand in the city, in villages and especially on market fair days.

With his years of experience in this field, he collaborates with Soro Yiriwaso to increase his working capital and satisfy his increasing number of customers. He is now on his second loan, having repaid the previous loan.

Ousmane will use his loan to buy bags of wheat flour. He buys from wholesalers in Bamako and often in Kolondièba. He retails his bread for cash, in his bakery and as an itinerant vendor, to a clientele composed of men and women.

Ousmane hopes to make a monthly profit of 85,000 CFA francs that will be used to support the family, repay the loan and be reinvested in his business.

loans.use: Purchase flour for bread making

loans.name: Luchando Siempre Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Raquel de 33 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos de 16, 13 y 11 años. Su negocio es una pulpería ubicada en su domicilio, venta de yoltamales, atol agrio, atol dulce desde hace 10 años, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado de  Masaya. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en materia prima para la elaboración de los productos como maíz, leña,cal,dulce, etc. y comprar inventario para la pulpería como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, gaseosa. Violeta mujer de 30 años de edad su negocio es la venta de gaseosa, comida, fresco, repostería y Marbely mujer de 32 años su negocio es una peluquería.
texts.en:
The women in this group are micro-entrepreneurs.  Raquel, 33, is one of them.  She's married and has three children, ages 16, 13, and 11.  Her business is a grocery store in her home.  She sells yoltamales [corn tamales] and atole beverages in the market in Masaya.  She has been a client of the institution for a year.

Raquel's requesting the loan to invest in ingredients to make her products.  She'll buy corn, firewood, lime, sweets, etc., as well as inventory for the grocery store such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, and soda.

Violeta, 30, sells soda, food, soft drinks, and pastry.  Marbely, 32, has a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and groceries

loans.name: Jehova Es Mi Pastor Group

texts.es: El grupo lo conforman tres socias microempresarias una de ellas es Lissete mujer de 43 años de edad, acompañada, su negocio es la venta de frutas en el mercado de Masaya desde hace 10 años, su papa y ella atiende el negocio y a los clientes. Tiene 10 años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito lo solicita para comprar tamarindo, naranja de fresco, calala, pitahaya. Justina mujer de 52 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas y Yamileth mujer de 36 años y su negocio es la venta de perecederos como tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, papa.
texts.en: The group has three microentrepreneur members. One of them is a woman named Lissete, who is 43 years old. She has been selling fruit in a market in Masaya for the last 10 years. She and her dad look after the business and customers.  She has been with the institution for 10 years. The loan she has requested is for the purchase of tamarind, fresh oranges, passion fruit, and dragon fruit.  A 52-year-old woman named Justina has a business which consists of the sale of fruits, and Yamileth, a 36-year-old woman, works selling perishable foods such as tomatoes, sweet peppers, onions, and potatoes.

loans.use: to purchase tamarind, fresh oranges, passion fruit, and dragon fruit.

loans.name: Amor Del Campo Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socios emprendedores uno de ellos es Silvia de 29 años de edad, soltera, con tres hijos bajo su cargo de 12, 4 y 2 años, su negocio es la venta de tamales pisques y dulce en el oriental desde hace 15 años. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 1 año, el crédito lo solicita para la compra de materia prima para la elaboración de los tamales como es cal, maíz, leña, dulces, azúcar. Ervin hombre de 40 años de edad su negocio es la venta de frutas, Blanca mujer de 28 años, se dedica al negocio de venta de verduras y Aura mujer de 48 años su negocio es la venta de tamales pisque, coyoles y pinolillo.
texts.en: This is group has four enterprising members. Silvia is 29 years old, single, and has three children aged 12, 4 and 2 in her charge. She has worked selling Pisque-style tamales and sweets in the market for 15 years. She has been part of the institution for a year. She needs the loan to buy raw materials for the preparation of tamales such as corn, sugar, lime, and firewood, as well as sweets. Ervin is 40 years old and his job is selling fruit. Blanca is 28 years old and works selling vegetables. Aura is 48 years old and she sells Pisque-style tamales, coyoles [fruit of the yagua palm] and pinolillo [a local cornmeal and cacao drink].

loans.use: buy raw materials for the preparation of tamales such as corn, sugar, lime and firewood, as well as sweets

loans.name: Rosada Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias luchadoras una de ellas es Lucrecia mujer de 52 años de edad, casada, con un hijo de 20 años, su negocio es la venta de artesanía en un tramo del mercado de Masaya desde hace 20 años. Es cliente de la institución desde hace 3 años. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cuadros de pinturas, camisetas nacionales, cerámica y hacerle mejoras al negocio. María mujer de 45 años de edad se dedica al negocio de la venta de gaseosa y Rosa mujer de 30 años su negocio es la venta de huevo.
texts.en: This group has three hard-working members. One of them is Lucrecia, who is a 52-year-old married woman with a 20-year-old son. For the past 20 years, she has been selling crafts in the market of Masaya. She has also been a client of the institution for 3 years. She needs the loan to buy canvas, national shirts and ceramics, as well as to make improvements to her business. Maria is 45 years old and works selling soda, and Rosa is 30 years old and sells eggs.

loans.use: buy canvas, national shirts and ceramics, and to improve the structure of her business

loans.name: Los Robles Group

texts.es: El grupo lo forman cuatro mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Yeraldin mujer de 27 años de edad, soltera, su negocio es la venta de cereales en un tramo del mercado oriental de Managua desde hace 10 años, el crédito lo solicita para comprar por quintal maíz, cacao, canela, semilla de jícaro, pujagua. Gloria mujer de 39 años su negocio es la venta de especie, Epifania mujer de 52 años su negocio es la venta de artesanía de madera, y Ana tiene 38 años y su negocio es la venta de frutas y verduras.
texts.en: This group has four enterprising women as its members.  One is Yeraldin - she is 27 years old, single, and, for ten years, has had a business selling cereals on a stretch of Mangua's eastern market.  She is applying for a loan to buy corn by the hundredweight, and cacao, cinnamon, and calabash.  Thirty-nine-year-old Gloria has a business selling spices.
