That is why she only fertilizes her land with organic products. She considers picking the coffee beans to be the most complicated part of the process, since she has to hire workers to later peel and air-dry the beans. 

This is her first loan with Kiva and she hopes to have the trust she needs to invest in her land. This time she wants to have 3,000 nuevos soles to purchase organic fertilizer for her coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer.

loans.name: 12-05-02 Quảng Tâm Group

texts.en:
Hằng works in agriculture raising poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase poultry and cattle to raise.

Hằng is 51 years old and she is married with 2 children.  She is the leader of a 3-member group, the 12-05-02 Quảng Tâm solidarity group. Hằng supports 1 dependent with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

This is Hằng first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women.  Hằng has been involved in this business for more than 10 years.  The main harship that Hằng faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hằng hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her children to find a good job, and to remodel her house.

loans.use: to buy poultry and cattle

loans.name: Muzaffar

texts.ru:
Музаффар примерный муж и отец. Ему 27 лет. Музаффар живет и работает в городе Душанбе. Несколько лет он работал в мобильной компании, к сожалению, он больше там не работает. Раньше Музаффар работал ювелиром. Он реставрировал и украшал ювелирные изделия. На сегодняшний день он решил снова вернуться в свое старое дело. Но теперь он планирует открыть свою собственную мастерскую и торговую точку. У Музаффара есть собственная квартита в городе Душанбе, где он планирует открыть мастерскую. Музаффар берет кредит, чтобы купить новые приборы и инструменты по изготовлению ювелирных изделий, так как старые уже не пригодны для работы. А также Музаффар на сбережение, которое имеет, хочет купить сырье для изготовления. 
Сейчас многие люди ценят и приобретают золотые и серебреные изделия ручной работы, изготовленные в основном в национальном стиле. Он верит в то что у него будет много клиентов. Музаффар постарается найти новых клиентов, чтобы начать и продолжить свою деятельность. В будущем, когда он соберет необходимую сумму денег, он приобретет большое количество сырья и начнет изготавливать и продавать собственные ювелирные изделия.
texts.en:
Muzaffar is an exemplary husband and father. He is 27 years old. Muzaffar lives and works in the city of Dushanbe. For several years he worked for a cell phone company. Unfortunately, he does not work there anymore. Previously, Muzaffar worked as a jeweler. He restored and decorated jewelry. Now, he has decided to return to his old job. He plans to open his own workshop and store. Muzaffar has his own apartment in Dushanbe where he plans to open a shop. Muzaffar is taking out a loan to buy new equipment and tools to produce jewelry. His old tools are not suitable for work. Muzaffar has savings which he plans to spend on raw materials for manufacturing. 

Many people appreciate and purchase gold and silver handicrafts made in the traditional style. He believes that he will have a lot of customers. Muzaffar will try to find new clients to start his business and keep it going.  When he gets enough money, he will buy a large amount of raw materials and begin to craft and sell his own jewelry.

loans.use: buy tools to craft jewelry.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: Gabriela de cincuenta y dos años de edad vive junto a sus cuatro hijos, su madre y su hermano en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la compra y venta de pollos y gallinas aliñadas, trabaja todos los días en su venta para ganarse honradamente el sustento diario; Gabriela es una mujer emprendedora y muy audaz siempre está buscando lo mejor para su familia; habitan en una vivienda ubicada en la zona rural, desde hace algunas semanas necesita realizar algunas reparaciones para mayor comodidad, desea arreglar el techo del cuarto, pues se filtra mucho el agua en esta época de lluvia, además quiere encementar el patio para que no se haga lodo por la tierra, espera empezar con el trabajo lo más rápido posible, pero debido a sus bajos recursos no puede costear el gasto de materiales  por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, arena, grava, lamina galvanizada, madera. Gabriela está muy contenta con la ayuda y espera corresponder con los pagos establecidos.
texts.en:
Fifty-two year old Gabriela lives with her four children, her mother and her brother in her own house.  She makes her living buying and selling chickens and seasoned chickens.  She works in her shop everyday in order to make an honest daily living.

Gabriela is an entrepreneurial and innovative woman, who is always looking for the best for her family.  They live in a house in the rural area.  For the past few weeks, it has needed some repairs for the sake of comfort.  She would like to fix the roof in the bedroom because it leaks a lot during the rainy season.  She also wants to cement the patio so that the dirt doesn't turn to mud.  

She hopes to begin the work as soon as possible, but due to scarce resources, she cannot cover the cost of the materials.  This is why she is applying to FUSAI for a loan that will allow her to buy cement, sand, gravel, galvanized sheets and wood.  Gabriela is very happy with the assistance and hopes to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, gravel, galvanized sheets and wood.

loans.name: Ritche

texts.en: Ritche operates a piggery busienss, raising pigs for sale. He is married and has one child.  Ritche always finds ways to augment their living, and had plans to expand his piggery.  He joined GDMPC recently and borrowed a loan of 15,000 PHP to buy more piglets and pig feed.  He hopes to have healthy pigs in order to gain more profit and use a portion of it to increase his business capital.

loans.use: buy piglets and feed

loans.name: Leonisa

texts.en:
Leonisa is 35 years old.  She is a married woman with two children who are in school. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur.

Leonisa has a motorcycle transport business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 10 years. 

Leonisa requested a PHP 40000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase spare parts and tools for the maintenance of her motorcycle.

Leonisa would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: buy motorcycle spare parts and tools

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita works hard to support her family. She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 8 years now.

Lolita requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional boxes of fish to sell.  In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fish

loans.name: Marina

texts.en:
Marina is 43 years old and married with three children. With three children currently in school, Marina works very hard to provide for them.

Marina runs a general store in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 8 years and sells a variety of items such as eggs, milk, coffee, canned goods, soy sauce, vinegar, snack foods, etc.

Marina requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy additional stocks to sell in her general store.   In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: restock her store

loans.name: Melitona

texts.en:
Melitona is 41 years old and has four children. She is married and one of her children is still in school.

Melitona is in the agricultural business farming vegetables in the Philippines.  She has been farming vegetables for 10 years now, and has borrowed 10 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

Melitona has requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.   She would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: buy fertilizers and farm supplies

loans.name: Yolly

texts.en:
Yolly runs a general store and a cafeteria in a village located in Ozamiz City. He is married and has three children. He has been doing this business for more than two years in order to make a living. 

Yolly joined GDMPC in 2012 and recently borrowed a loan of 35,000 PHP to buy grocery goods for resale and raw ingredients for his cafeteria. His determination makes him worked punctually and diligently in order to improve his business and the general living situation of his family.

loans.use: restock his store and buy ingredients for his cafeteria

loans.name: Juliet

texts.en:
Juliet works hard to support her family.  She is married and has a fish vending business in the Philippines.

Juliet requested a PHP 14000 loan through NWTF to buy more fish to sell.  She has been in this business for 8 years now.

Juliet would like to build and expand her business to secure the future for her family.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell

loans.name: Miguela

texts.en:
Miguela is a married woman with six children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Miguela is 44 years old and three of her children are still in school.

Miguela has a vegetables vending business in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 5 years.

Miguela requested a PHP 14000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more vegetables to sell to her customers.  In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: buy vegetables

loans.name: Ma. Rowena

texts.en:
Rowena works hard to support her family.  Rowena is married and has a business selling bags and accessories in the Philippines.  She has been in this business for 23 years now.

Rowena requested a PHP 30000 loan through NWTF to purchase more bags and accessories to sell.  In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: buy bags and accessories

loans.name: Abdugafor

texts.ru: Абдугафору 29 лет. Он со своей женой и двумя детьми живет в северной столице Таджикистана, в городе Худжанд. Он работает штукатурщиком - штукатурит стены. Пока он работает, его жена Мукаррам следит за сыном и дочкой. В данный момент у Абдугафора мало заказов на ремонт и он хочет заняться другой работой. Его друг предложил ему поработать оператором на свадьбах и разных мероприятиях. Абдугафор умеет снимать на камеру, но не имеет видеокамеры. По этой причине он просит кредит, чтобы приобрести камеру. С помощью камеры, но получит интересную и доходную работу. Надеемся, что у него все получится, потому что он всегда старается во благо семьи.
texts.en: Abdugafor is 29 years old. He, his wife, and their two children live in the northern capital of Tajikistan, Khujand. He works as a plasterer, plastering walls. While he works, his wife, Mukarram, cares for their son and daughter. At the moment, Abdugafor has too few jobs lined up, so he wants to do other work. His friend invited him to work as a videographer at weddings and various other events. Abdugafor knows how to use a camera, but he does not have a video camera. Therefore, he is asking for a loan to purchase a camera. With the camera, he will be able to get an interesting and lucrative job. We hope that he will succeed because he is always trying to do what is best for his family.

loans.use: buy a video camera.

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат житель горного района Варзоб. Ему 27 лет. Он женат, детей еще не имеет. Шухрат вместе с женой живет в родительском доме. Так как у него нет высшего образования, он зарабатывает на жизнь предоставляя услуги такси. Шухрат работает по маршрутной линии города Душанбе, потому что в столице спрос на услуги такси всегда велик. Шухрат занимается этой деятельностью около 7 лет. Сейчас его машине требуется ремонт. Поэтому он обратился за кредитом. Отремонтировав машину Шухрат сможет снова продолжить свое дело, за счет которого он кормит семью.
texts.en: Shuhrat lives in the mountainous region of Varzob. He is 27 years old. He is married but has no children yet. Shuhrat and his wife live in his parents' home. Since he doe snot have a higher education, he makes a living by driving a taxi. Shukhrat drives a route to and from Dushanbe, the capital, because there is always a high demand for this service. Shuhrat has been doing this work for about seven years. Now his car needs to be repaired. Therefore, he applied for a loan. Shuhrat can then repair his car and continue his work, with which he feeds his family.

loans.use: repair his taxi.

loans.name: Antawara Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ANTAWARA” iniciará el segundo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Patacamaya, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Erodita es la Tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de ganado, venta de papa y chuño, venta de suéter y mantas, artesanía en ponchos mantas y awayos, producción.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Erodita es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de la promoción que realizó la institución en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de crianza de ganado que inicio hace veinte años atrás al aprendiendo cuando ayudaba a sus padres en el mismo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de ganado) que adquirirá de las ferias aledañas a su vivienda y posteriormente los criará en su domicilio. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia, ya que ella es casada y tiene seis hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las capacitaciones de salud y crédito.
texts.en:
The communal bank ‘Antawara’ will begin its second loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Patacamaya regional office. It is composed of eight members and is governed by a board of directors of which Erodita is treasurer. The businesses carried out by the members of the bank are diverse and include selling livestock, selling potatoes and chuño (dehydrated potatoes), selling sweaters and blankets, and selling artisan ponchos, blankets, and aguayos (traditional blankets).

The loan they will take out will benefit small micro-businesses of which Erodita is a member. She indicates that five months ago she became a member of Pro Mujer thanks to a promotional invitation when they were in her area. Currently, she runs a business raising livestock that started 20 years ago, which she learned by helping her parents in the same business.

Erodita is taking this loan out to increase capital. She will buy livestock from the neighboring fairs and afterwards she will raise them at her home. This type of work allows her to generate resources to maintain her family since she is married and has six children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responded that she likes the trainings on health and loans.

loans.use: to buy livestock.

loans.name: Khurbibi

texts.ru: Хурбиби 53-летняя вдова с тремя детьми. Она проживает в районе Шахритус. Ее старший сын находится на заработках в России, остальные дети живут вместе с ней. Хурбиби имеет свой торговый бизнес. Она на рынке района имеет торговую точку, где продает детские одежды. Она занимается этим бизнесом уже три года. Хурбиби милая и отзывчивая женщина. Она относится к своим клиентам доброжелательно и обслуживает их на хорошем уровне. Сейчас она нуждается в кредите для развития бизнеса. Хурбиби на сумму от кредита хочет приобрести сезонную детскую одежду. Она оптом привозит свой товар с города Душанбе и продает по розничной цене в своем районе.
texts.en:
Khurbibi is a 53 year old widow with three children.  She lives in Shahrituz.  Her oldest son is working abroad, in Russia, while the rest of her children live with her.  Khurbibi has her own retail business, which she has been running for three years.  Khurbibi is a sweet and a sympathetic woman.  She is very kind to her clients, and provides them with the highest level of service.  

Currently, she is in need of a loan to expand her business.  Khurbibi wishes to use the loan to purchase seasonal children's clothing for resale.  She purchases her goods in bulk in Dushanbe and sells them at retail prices at her local market.

loans.use: To purchase seasonal children's clothing for resale

loans.name: Griselda

texts.es: Griselda de cincuenta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus cinco hijos y su nieto en casa propia, son siete personas en el hogar. Ella es empleada domestica y sus dos hijos mayores, le ayudan con su trabajo para completar los gastos del hogar; Griselda es una mujer activa, audaz y sobre todo entregada a su labor y a su familia, su vivienda  necesita más seguridad, por eso quiere aprovechar la oportunidad de ponerle una nueva puerta en la entrada principal y dos ventanas con balcón, además quiere construir el pasamanos alrededor de la casa, quiere empezar con el trabajo. Griselda ya tuvo su primer crédito con FUSAI y con él realizó el pavimento del corredor de su casa y cambió la lámina de su techo. su primer crédito ya lo canceló. Hoy solicita a FUSAI un segundo crédito que le permita comprar una puerta, dos ventanas, cemento, ladrillo, arena. Griselda está muy alegre con la ayuda y se compromete de nuevo a cancelar cada pago.
texts.en: Griselda is 55 years old and lives with her five children and one grandson. They all live in her home for a total of seven people. She is employed as a domestic workers and her two older children help her to pay for household costs. Griselda is an active, daring, and hard working women dedicated to her family. Her home needs more security and so she wants to take advantage of this opportunity to install a new front door and two windows on her balcony, as well as build a guardrail around the home. Griselda has already completed her first loan with FUSAI that she used to pave her walkway and to re-roof her home. Her first loan has already been payed back. Today she is applying for a new loan with FUSAI that will help her to purchase a door, two windows, cement, bricks, and sand. Griselda is very happy to receive the help she has gotten and she promises to make punctual payments.

loans.use: purchase a door, two windows, cement, bricks and sand.

loans.name: 3.05.345.9.thiệu Trung Group

texts.en:
Nụ is 29 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province.  For the past five years, Nụ has worked in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women in 2013 to improve her business. Nụ has successfully repaid one previous loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Her main business hardship is the lack of capital

Nụ is the leader of the 3.05.345.9.Thiệu Trung solidarity group, which has four members. She will use her portion of the loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell in the future. Nụ will use the profit from her loan to maintain a successful business. She hopes that her business will do well and that she will be able to buy more supplies and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell

loans.name: Marcelina

texts.en:
Marcelina is running her business selling fish in the community of Clarin, Misamis Occidental where her family resides. She has been in this business for more than six years. Marcelina joined GDMPC in 2010 and she successfully repaid her previous loan that she used to purchase fish. 

Marcelina is requesting a 15,000 PHP loan to purchase more variety of fish and other seafood to sell. She is determined to improve her business and gain income. Marcelina plans to use her additional profit to improve the general living situation of her family.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fish and other seafood

loans.name: 02.07.03 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Thủy is 48 years old and married with two adult children who are no longer her dependents. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province.  For the past two years, Thủy has worked in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital. 

Thủy is the leader of the 02.07.03 Đông Hải solidarity group which has eight members. She will use her portion of their loan to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell in the future. Thủy plans to use the profit from her loan to keep her family healthy and happy. She hopes that her children find good jobs and that her business will do well.

loans.use: to purchase baby cattle to raise and sell

loans.name: 02.07.02 Đông Hải Group

texts.en:
Hoa is 21 years old and married with a child. She lives and works in Thanh Hoa city, an urban area in Thanh Hoa province. For the past two years, she has operated a business sewing clothing. One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital.

Hoa is the leader of the 02.07.02 Đông Hải solidarity group which consists of six members. She will use her portion of their group loan to purchase a sewing machine to sew clothing. This is Hoa’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She will use the profit from her loan to keep her family healthy and happy. Hoa hopes that her business will do well and that her child will do well in school.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine to sew clothing

loans.name: Azucena

texts.en: Azucena is married and has nine children. They all live in the village of Calabayan in Ozamiz City. Her husband works as a driver, while she manages a cafeteria to make a living. She borrowed a loan of 10,000 PHP from GDMPC micro credit to purchase more raw ingredients and additional pots for her cafeteria. She want to improve her business to gain more profit for the improvement of her family's living.

loans.use: to purchase more raw ingredients and additional pots for her cafeteria

loans.name: 03.07.02 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hạnh works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Hạnh is 56 years old, married, and has one child. She is the group leader of the 03.07.02 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of seven members. Hạnh lives with one dependent in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in Thanh Hoa province.

In 2008, Hạnh joined Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women to improve her business. She has successfully repaid one loan from Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. Hạnh has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Hạnh faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hạnh hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her child to find a good job.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: 3.18.341.1.yên Thọ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Nam works in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

Nam is 39 years old, married, and has two children. She is the group leader of the 3.18.341.1.Yên Thọ solidarity group, which consists of six members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with two dependents.

This is Nam's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Nam faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Nam hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Juana Maribel

texts.es: Juana Maribel de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su hija de 9 años y  sus padres en casa propia. Ella posee una panadería, trabaja todos los días desde muy temprano para vender pan calientito y para ganarse el sustento día a día. Juana es una mujer entregada a su labor, muy activa y sobre todo responsable, su vivienda está ubicada en una zona rural, es una casa humilde que necesita algunas reparaciones, quiere construir un muro de contención al frente de toda la vivienda, pero debido a su baja condición económica no posee de capital para costear los gastos  de material por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar, cemento, arena, hierro y ladrillos. Juana Maribel está muy feliz con la ayuda y se compromete a cancelar la deuda.
texts.en:
Juana Maribe, 28, lives with her nine-year-old daughter and her parents in their own house. She owns a bakery, where she sells bread and earns a living working from early morning every day. Juana is dedicated to her profession, active, and, above all, responsible. 

Her modest home, located in a rural area, needs repairs. She wants to build a wall in front of the house; however, given her low income, she lacks money to pay for materials. So she has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand, iron, and bricks. Juana Maribel is pleased with the funding and promises to pay her debt.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, iron, and bricks.

loans.name: 03.04.05 - Quảng Hưng Group

texts.en:
Hương has a retail business selling coal. She is requesting a loan to purchase coal to resell. This is Hương's first loan with Fund for Thanh Hoa Poor Women. Hương is the group leader of the 03.04.05 - Quảng Hưng solidarity group, which consists of 6 members. 

Hương is 38 years old.  She is married with 3 children. Hương supports 3 dependents with her business in Thanh Hoa city, an urban town in the Thanh Hoa province. Hương has been involved in her business for more than 10 years. The main hardship that Hương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

In the future, Hương hopes for her business to do well, for her family to be healthy and happy, and for her children to find good jobs.

loans.use: to purchase coal to resell.

loans.name: 3.18.342.1.yên Thọ Group

texts.en:
Mrs. Hương has a retail business selling dry food. She is requesting a loan to purchase calves to raise and sell in the future.

Hương is 39 years old, married, and has three children. She is the group leader of the 3.18.342.1.Yên Thọ solidarity group, which consists of five members. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province, with three dependents

This is Hương's first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She has been involved in this business for more than 10 years. The main harship that Hương faces in her business is the lack of capital.

With her business profit, Hương hopes for her business to do well, for her children to do well in school, and to be able to buy more supplies and equipment for her business.

loans.use: to purchase calves to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Tita

texts.en:
Tita is 52 years old and married with five children, one of whom is still in school. She works very hard to provide for her family. For the past 14 years, Tita has run a general store in the Philippines where she sells a variety of items such as diapers, shampoo, bath soap, noodles, sugar, and other groceries. 

Tita is requesting a 12,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more stocks such as diapers, shampoo, bath soap, noodles, sugar, and other groceries. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy diapers, shampoo, bath soap, noodles, sugar and other groceries

loans.name: Khantaty Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “KHANTATY”  iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Elvira es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de dulces y comida, venta de verduras, venta de abarrotes, tejido de prendas, tienda de barrio, artesanía en chompas, venta de enaguas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Elvira es integrante, ella indica que hace dos años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de su amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; este negocio lo emprendió hace más de veinte años, cuando su zona se empezaba a poblar y observando pocos comercios decide emprender este negocio con la finalidad de generar recursos.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz, azúcar, aceite) que adquirirá de las tiendas mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el crédito que se ofrece.
texts.en:
The communal bank, Khantaty, will begin its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Collpani office. Khantaty is made up of 8 members and is managed by a board of directors where Elvira is the President. The businesses that the members of this communal bank bring to the table are varied and include: selling food, selling sweets and snacks, selling vegetables, selling groceries, weaving clothing, running a neighborhood store, making artisanal sweaters, and selling underskirts. 

This loan will benefit these small business owners including Elvira, who points out that it's been two years since she joined Pro Mujer after being invited to join by a friend who was already a member. Currently, Elvira's business is a neighborhood store, which she opened more than 20 years ago when her neighborhood's population was beginning to grow and she noticed few stores of this kind opening. 

The loan that she is taking out now will increase her capital to buy rice, sugar, and oil, which she gets from the wholesale stores in the city, El Alto. Later she will sell these products in her own store. This form of work allows her to generate the resources necessary to maintain her home and care for her family. She is married and has four children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, Elvira responded that she likes the loans which they offer.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, and oil.

loans.name: 3.18.343.2.yên Thọ Group

texts.en:
Hải is 29 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. For the past three years, Hải has worked in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital.

Hải is the leader of the 3.18.343.2.Yên Thọ solidarity group which consists of seven members. She will use her portion of their group loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. This is Hải’s first loan with Thanh Hoa Fund of Poor Women. She will use the profit from her loan to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and to be able to buy more business supplies and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell

loans.name: 3.18.344.1.yên Thọ Group

texts.en:
Quế is 37 years old and married with two children. She lives and works in Thieu Hoa district, a rural area in Thanh Hoa province. For the past 10 years, Quế has worked in agriculture, farming poultry and cattle. One of her most critical business difficulties is the lack of capital. 

Quế is the leader of the 3.18.344.1.Yên Thọ solidarity group which consists of four members. This is Quế’s first loan with the Thanh Hoa Fund for Poor Women. She will use her portion of their group loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future. Quế will use the profit from her loan to make enough money to provide for her kids, to maintain a successful business, and be able to buy more business supplies and equipment.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell

loans.name: Resma

texts.en:
Resma is from Lupagan, Clarin, MIsamis Occidental where she operates and owns a farm to make a living. Her husband is also earning income from operating a vehicle. They both work together in order to support the needs of her three children. 

Resma successfully repaid her previous loan from Gata Daku Multi-Purpose Cooperative (GDMPC) that was used to improve their farm. 

They planned to cultivate the adjacent farm, so without hesitation, Resma borrowed a new loan of PHP 15,000 to finance the costs of plowing and fertilizing her farm. 

She wants to save the profit for the future education of her children.

loans.use: to pay for the labor costs of farm maintenance and to purchase fertilizer, such as manure.

loans.name: Emiteria

texts.en:
Emiteria is 54 years old, married, and had seven children. Only one child still lives with her. 

To make a living, Emiteria and her spouse plant and harvest rice to sell. They also raise hogs as an additional source of income.

Emeteria would like to improve the productivity of her rice field, but due to insufficient funds, she hasn't been able to do so. 

She then requested additional capital of PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and herbicides used in farming. She knows that, through proper application of farm inputs to her rice crops, she will be able to gain better yields and profit in this next harvest season.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, insecticides, and herbicides used in farming.

loans.name: Dinora

texts.es: Dinora de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a sus tres hijos menores de edad, su hermano y su abuela en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la elaboración de comales de barro, además para complementar los gastos del hogar recibe una pequeña remesa del esposo que se encuentra en el extranjero. Dinora es una mujer decidida y muy entregada a su labor, le gusta aprovechar las oportunidades que se le presentan, su vivienda está ubicada en una zona rural y FUSAI le proporcionó un primer crédito que con él comenzó un cuarto para tener más espacio, hoy necesita poner el techo con una lamina resistente, y de nuevo solicita a FUSAI un segundo crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada, polines y pago de mano de obra. Dinora está muy contenta con la ayuda y asegura que cancelara ésta nueva deuda.
texts.en:
Dinora, 35, lives with her three children, her brother, and her grandmother in their own house. She makes clay griddles to pay household expenses, and she also receives some money from her husband, who lives abroad. Dinora is determined and dedicated to her work. She likes to take advantage of opportunities.

Her house is in a rural area. FUSAI offered her the first loan, which she used to start building a room to have more space. She now needs to put on a galvanized steel roof, and has applied to FUSAI for a second loan to buy galvanized steel and beams and to pay laborers. Dinora is pleased with the support and promise to pay her loan.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel and beams and to pay laborers.

loans.name: Maria Luisa

texts.es: María Luisa de cuarenta y cuatro años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y su hijo de 11 años en casa propia. Ella se dedica a la venta de antojitos típicos, pan dulce y tamales, trabaja todos los días junto a su esposo para poder ganarse el sustento para el hogar. María es una mujer muy activa y audaz lo más importante para ella es su familia quiere darles lo mejor; su vivienda está ubicada en las afueras de la ciudad, desde hace algún tiempo comenzó el trabajo de construir un baño que les diera más comodidad, pero no logro terminarlo por eso ahora necesita reanudar el trabajo, poner una puerta, colocar piso cerámico, y poner el techo, no posee del capital suficiente para los materiales debido a su condición económica y le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar lamina galvanizada, cemento, arena, piso cerámico, polines, una puerta. María Luisa está muy agradecida con la ayuda y se compromete  a cancelar en el periodo establecido.
texts.en:
María Luisa, 44, lives with her life partner and 11-year-old son in their own house. She sells traditional appetizers, sweet breads, and tamales. She and her husband work every day to support their family. María is active and courageous. The most important thing to her is giving her family the best.

Her house is located on the outskirts of the city. Some time ago, she began building a bathroom to make her family more comfortable, but she hasn't finished it. She needs to continue the work and put up a door, place ceramic floor tiles, and put on a roof. Due to her low income, she lacks money to buy materials. She has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy galvanized steel, cement, sand, ceramic floor tiles, beams, and a door. María Luisa is pleased with the support and promise to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy galvanized steel, cement, sand, ceramic floor tiles, beams, and a door.

loans.name: Nena

texts.en: Nena is from the village of  Lapasan, Clarin. She has owned and operated a transportation service business for more than five years to make a living. Her tenant transports passengers and their baggage to their respective places. She plans to have a new unit to expand her business and to be prepared for the future of her only child. In 2007, Nena joined GDMPC and received a loan that she used to buy spare parts and accessories for her pedicabs. She successfully repaid the loan. She has requested a new loan of 6,000 PHP to buy motorcycle tires and helmets. She hopes to expand her business and be able to improve the living situation of her family.

loans.use: to purchase motorcycle tires and helmets

loans.name: Janeth

texts.en:
Janeth has six children and lives with her family in the village of Calabayan in Ozamiz City.  For the past five years, she has run a general store. Her husband works managing their own banana and corn farm. 

Janeth is requesting an 8,000 PHP loan from GDMPC microcredit to buy more grocery items such as canned goods, sugar, sardines, noodles, and other products. Janeth will use the profit from her loan to provide additional capital for her business, provide for her family’s daily needs, and to be set aside for the education of her children. It has always been her dream to send her children to school to someday become successful.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, sugar, sardines, noodles, and other products

loans.name: Merly

texts.en:
Merly is 56 years old and married. She has five children, and she works very hard to provide for them. Merly runs a general store in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 10 years and sells a variety of items, such as seasonings, canned goods, soy sauce, milk, and coffee.

Merly has requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF. She will use it to buy additional items to sell in her general store, like seasonings, canned goods, soy sauce, milk or coffee. Merly would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional items to sell, like seasonings, canned goods, and coffee

loans.name: Monielita

texts.en:
Monielita is a hardworking entrepreneur, who has a vegetable-vending business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for 15 years, and she earns additional income by keeping a general store.

She is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF. She will use the loan to purchase more vegetables to sell.

Monielita has been sustaining her business activities through her own efforts, with the help of loans from NWTF. She dreams of building and expanding her business, to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to purchase more vegetables to sell

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is 32 years and married with three children, two of whom are still in school.  For the past 19 years, she has worked selling fruits and vegetables in the Philippines. Marilou is a very hardworking working entrepreneur. 

Marilou is requesting a 24,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy more fruits and vegetables to sell. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables to sell

loans.name: Lucille

texts.en:
Lucille is 24 years old and single. She is a very hard-working entrepreneur. She has a bakery business in the Philippines. She has been in this business for five years.

Lucille requested a PHP 13,000 loan amount through NWTF. She will use the loan to buy ingredients for her bread production business, like flour, sugar, salt, and yeast.

In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her bread production business, like flour, sugar, salt, and yeast.

loans.name: Georgina Zuleyma

texts.es: Georgina Zuleyma de veintiocho años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos menores de edad uno 10 años, uno de 5 años y uno de 10 meses. Ella se dedica a la venta de ropa, además su esposo trabaja de vigilante todos los días, juntos logran obtener el sustento diario, Georgina sabe que no es fácil salir adelante, pero hace lo posible porque quiere darle a sus  hijos lo mejor que puede, su vivienda necesita algunos cambios para tener más espacio y comodidad, quiere construir un pequeño cuarto en el corredor, pero no posee del fondos suficientes para costear los gastos de materiales por eso solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, ladrillos, arena, grava, hierro. Georgina Zuleyma se siente muy feliz con la ayuda y comprometida a cancelar cada pago.
texts.en:
Georgina Zuleyma, 28, lives with her life partner and three children, ages 10, 5, and five months. She sells clothing, and her husband works as a security guard every day. Together they manage to provide for their family. Georgina knows that success doesn't come easily, but she does what she can to give her children the best possible. 

Her house needs some renovation so that it is more spacious and comfortable. She wants to build a small room in the hallway, but she lacks money to pay for materials. She has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron. Georgina Zuleyma is happy to have the funding and promises to make all her payments.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, sand, gravel, and iron.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase increased amounts of fish, thus aiding her in improving her overall sales.

loans.name: Rosario Guadalupe

texts.es: Rosario Guadalupe de treinta y cinco años de edad vive junto a su compañero de vida y sus tres hijos, uno de 13 años, otro de 7 años y uno de 4 años, habitan en casa propia, ella sostiene el hogar con ayuda de su esposo, vende ropa nueva y productos por catalogo; Rosario es una mujer muy activa, dedicada al trabajo y a sus hijos, su vivienda está ubicada en una zona rural, es una casa sencilla, que necesita una canaleta de aguas lluvias, es urgente porque estamos en época de invierno y no quiere que se le inunde la casa, no tiene capital para costear los gastos de materiales por eso le solicita a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar cemento, grava, arena, hierro y ladrillo. Rosario Guadalupe está muy alegre con la ayuda y se compromete a cancelar los pagos en el periodo indicado.
texts.en:
Rosario Guadalupe, 35, lives with her life partner and three children, ages 13, 7, and 4, in their own house. She and her husband support the family; she sells clothing by catalog. Rosario is active and dedicated to her work and children.

Her modest house is in a rural area, and it needs a gutter system to carry off rainwater. This is urgent because we are in the winter season, and she doesn't want the house to flood. She doesn't have money to pay for materials, so she has applied to FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, gravel, sand, iron, and brick. Rosario Guadalupe is pleased to have funding and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, gravel, sand, iron, and brick.

loans.name: M. Nadeem

texts.en:
M. Nadeem is living in Lahore city, where the mostly Indian families are living. His town is very populated and most of the crowd belongs to India. Many people like to chew betel leaf, so a few years ago he decided to open a betel leaf shop, to offer various kinds of betel leaf products to the people. He offers betel leaf in several kinds of mixtures -- for example, 'sweet paan,' (which consists of betel leaf mixed with chopped or coarsely ground areca nuts, mint, coconut, fruit preserves, 'gulkand,' or rose petal preserves, and various spices) and 'tobacco paan' (which consists of powdered betel leaf mixed with tobacco).
 
He is an expert in preparing 'paan,' because he has been running this shop for many years, and a lot of customers like to chew betel leaf products that have been prepared by him. In addition to betel leaf products, he offers cigarettes of different brands.
 
M. Nadeem is 36 years of age and the father of four children. He has only a single source of income to support his household. For the growth of his business, he wants to start offering cold drinks, soft drinks, and mineral water. His customers demand cold drinks also, which was part of his decision to offer drinks. But he does not have a refrigerator for the preservation and chilling of drinks, or savings.

Therefore, M. Nadeem requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan. He will use the loan to buy a refrigerator and cold drinks to sell. In this way, he will succeed in winning the trust of his customers and getting more income at the same time. His family's needs are growing day by day; with the additional income he will earn by using the loan he could easily cope and handle critical situations, too. M. Nadeem is very thankful to Kiva and hopes that the Kiva lenders will support him.

loans.use: to add a new business line to his shop, by buying a refrigerator and cold drinks to sell

loans.name: Consetta

texts.en:
Consetta is 28 years old and separated; she has three children. She runs a small business, making and selling barbeque in her community. She has been doing this for two years.

She is requesting this loan to help her make improvements to her house, so her family can have better living conditions. Consetta will use part of the loan to buy iron roofing and lumber. She will use another part of her loan to buy boxes of chicken, sausages, soy sauce and tomato sauce, for making barbeque. Consetta joined SPBD in 2012, to gain access to financial services.

loans.use: to buy iron roofing and lumber for home improvements, and boxes of chicken, sausages and sauces, for her barbeque business

loans.name: Rowella

texts.en:
Rowella works hard to support her family. She is married and has a bakery business in the Philippines.

Rowella requested a PHP 20,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients like sugar, flour, salt, yeast, etc. for her business.

Rowella has been in this business for 5 years.

Rowella would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients like sugar, flour, salt, yeast, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Socorro

texts.en:
Socorro is 59 years old and married with six children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. 

Socorro has a coconut wine vending business in the Philippines. Socorro requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional containers of coconut wine to sell.

Socorro has been in this business for eight years. Socorro would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional containers of coconut wine to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to increase her current stock of childrens diapers

loans.name: Mukhtar's Group

texts.en:
Mukhtar is a 51-year-old, married woman, living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is the mother of five daughters and two sons. 

Mukhtar requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, for her husband. Her husband is a shoemaker and he is very expert in his profession. He has been manufacturing shoes for many years. This is the reason he has a lot of experience in his profession. 

Mukhtar's husband sews leather and rexine shoes with a machine. Then he attaches the sole to the shoe by stitching it with his hands. In this way, he is getting income for his family. 

His sewing machine is out of order and he wants to replace it with a new one, but he does not have sufficient funds to buy a new machine. Therefore, Mukhtar has requested a loan for her husband, so that he could buy a new sewing machine.

Her family has to do hard work to get income for a huge family. Her sons also participate in the monthly income. Mukhtar wants to marry off her daughter, this is why she wants to save most of the earnings. 

Mukhtar is very thankful to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan. Note: Mukhtar raises her hand in the picture.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine, so her husband can sew shoes to sell.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en: Richard is a farmer within his locality. He is 36 years old, married, and has a child. Richard is determined and working hard to attain success in life. Richard's main crop is rice. He has been planting and harvesting rice to sell for over five years now, with determination to improve his rice crop production and way of life. Richard requested a loan of PHP 15,000 to buy fertilizer and pesticides which will be used in his farming business. He knows that this loan amount will help him in achieving his goals in life.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pesticides to use in farming

loans.name: Lorelyn

texts.en:
Lorelyn is 38 years old and married with eight children.

She earns a living by having a pig fattening business in the Philippines. Lorelyn is borrowing PHP 12000 through NWTF to purchase additional piglets, feed and vaccines for her business.

Lorelyn has been in pig fattening for 5 years and also earns additional income from motorcycle transport.

She is working tirelessly towards the attainment of her dream: to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to school.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets, feed and vaccines for her business
